caption.p: Fewer virus-loaded actin tails in the presence of Retro-1 inhibitors. Confocal microscopy images of cells infected with VACV WR A4-YFP virus in the presence or absence of Retro-1 analogs PA63, PA24, and PA104. Lower magnification images of cells pictured in Figure 4. Scale bars represent 10 Î¼m and white boxes indicate the area within each cell that was magnified to create Figure 4.
